attributes.action: cut down/ban adverts on our televisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Subscriptions for skytv etc keep rising and so does the adverts it's about time they were cut down or banned from our tv's altogether. These ads are ruining the programmes, after every 15 minutes or so you get 5 minutes of ads, it's a joke and is starting to take the enjoyment out of viewing.

rejection.details: This is a matter which you should raise with Ofcom in the first instance - see http://www.ofcom.org.uk/contactus/ for details on how you can get in touch with them.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
